title: Brooklyn Nets Website
author: mbavio

comments.content: I think it's an artificially emboldened **[Berthold Akzidenz Grotesk (Light Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155054/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Berthold%20Akzidenz%20Grotesk%20BE%20-%20Light%20Condensed&fid=631ff83f98f5423c8c42cc1cc53dcc24&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=HELLO%20BROOKLYN.%20ARE%20YOU%20READY%3F&wrap=2)**
